column1: Clay was a Sergeant in the United States Army serving in the Korean War. He was past Commander and member of the honor guard of the American Legion Post 89 and was a member of the Veteran of Foreign Wars Post 1925. He had retired from Pantasote Industries after 32 years and then retired after another 10 years at Kiefer Paper Mill. Clay loved the outdoors
column3: but especially loved his grandkids and had a nick name for each one.
